price: Kandi rwose umuvumo wanjye uzagukurikirana kuzageza ku munsi w’ibihembo.
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
